name: Disable-HAGS
commandPattern: New-Item -Path 'HKLM:\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\GraphicsDrivers' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Out-Null; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\GraphicsDrivers' -Name 'HwSchMode' -Type DWord -Value 1; Write-Host "HAGS désactivé" -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Warning "Redémarrage requis pour appliquer les changements"
